jobDescription: ENERGY FOR WHAT’S AHEAD Are you looking to make a difference in your career? We’re working on smarter grids, cleaner energy and tools to help people manage energy more efficiently. Position Overview: This position will contribute to an exciting initiative impacting how employees across Southern California Edison (SCE) view, analyze and leverage financial and operational data. Sound interesting? If so, read on!  The Business Data and Reporting Analyst will be part of the Reporting Team within the Operational Finance organization at SCE. The successful candidate will participate in and lead components of an initiative to transform SCE’s financial and operational data reporting capabilities using the latest technologies. This will involve development of new interactive and visual tools and databases for financial and regulatory reporting, strategic planning, goal tracking, budgeting, and management decision making. Other responsibilities include developing and improving related business processes, advising clients on technical strategies to address issues, and advancing existing reporting methods.
